title: Steven Runciman's three-volume work, first published in 1951, A History of the Crusades, Harmondsworth: Penguin, is the best-known account in English, and is justly famous for the clarity and elegance of its style. Runciman's access to oriental sources was through translations. A sound single-volume survey is H
